design_strategy.core_philosophy: Digital Clay. The site should feel tactile, grounded, and alive. Avoid sterile white backgrounds. Use cream/bone as the canvas. Animations should be slow and viscous (like honey or growth), not snappy and robotic.
design_strategy.target_audience: Conscious consumers, organic farmers, gardening enthusiasts

primary_font.name: Syne
primary_font.reason: Syne has an 'Art Nouveau' organic quirkiness that feels grown, not built. It breaks the 'Inter' generic tech look.

secondary_font.name: Manrope
secondary_font.usage: Body text, UI elements, Buttons, Price tags
secondary_font.reason: Highly readable modern geometric sans that pairs perfectly with Syne's eccentricity.

usage_rules.background: Use cream_base (#F5F1E8) for 80% of page backgrounds. Pure white only for cards/inputs.
usage_rules.text: Use earth_dark (#2D342C) for text. NEVER use pure black.
usage_rules.primary_action: forest_primary (#4A7C59) for main buttons. Hover: Darken by 10%.
usage_rules.secondary_action: lime_accent (#7FB539) for 'Sale' tags or 'New' badges only. Don't overuse.

colors.gradients: No linear gradients. Use soft radial gradients of lime_accent at 5% opacity behind hero images for 'glow'.

layout_and_grid.spacing_scale: Relaxed. Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Avoid tight p-4 clusters.
layout_and_grid.bento_grid: Use CSS Grid for the Hero and Category sections. Asymmetry is key. 1x1, 2x1, 2x2 cells.
layout_and_grid.border_radius: rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl. Organic shapes, no sharp corners except for deliberate Brutalist contrast (optional).

cards.product_card: Bg-white. rounded-3xl. No visible border. Soft shadow-xl. Image takes 60% of height. Price tag floats top-right.
cards.category_card: Image full cover with gradient overlay. Text bottom-left.

inputs.style: Bg-white. Border-b-2 border-forest_primary/20. No outline. Focus: Border-forest_primary.
inputs.radius: rounded-t-lg rounded-b-none (Underline style) OR Full pill rounded-full for search.

navigation.style: Floating glassmorphism. bg-cream_base/80 backdrop-blur-md. Border-b border-forest_primary/10.

motion_and_interaction.scrolling: lenis (optional but recommended for smooth feel)
rules: Images must have a subtle 'parallax' or 'scale' effect on hover.
Page transitions: Fade in + Slide up (y: 20 -> 0).

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react'. Style: Thin strokes (1.5px). Color: forest_primary.

implementation_notes.tech_stack_adjustment: Project is using React (CRA) structure, not Next.js. Use 'react-router-dom' for routing. Do not use Next.js specific components like or 'next/font'. Use standard and CSS imports for fonts.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
